last_episode_to_air.name: Ribbon Alvida
last_episode_to_air.overview: An excited Sarah and Duck take the Shallots to see the Ribbon Sisters perform with their family circus.

name: Sarah & Duck
overview: Sarah & Duck is a British animated children's television series created by Sarah Gomes Harris and Tim O'Sullivan, and produced by Karrot Entertainment for the BBC. Designed as a story-driven animation primarily targeted at 4-6 year old children, it was first broadcast on the UK CBeebies channel on 18 February 2013. A total of 40 episodes have been commissioned for the first series. 30 of these will have been shown in the UK by the end of August 2013, with a further 10 in production.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: The series follows the adventures of Sarah, a very kind, polite seven-year-old girl, with big eyes, rosy cheeks and a green hat, and her best friend Duck, a Mallard. The central theme is the relationship between these two characters and the adventures they have together. CBeebies state that the show has two learning themes: 'Friendship and imagination' and 'Problem Solving'.

episodes.name: Lots of Shallots
episodes.overview: Sarah and Duck find some free seeds in their newspaper and plant them to see what grows.

episodes.name: Sarah, Duck and the Penguins
episodes.overview: Duck wants to be a penguin, so Sarah decides it is time for a trip to the zoo.

episodes.name: Cheer Up Donkey
episodes.overview: Sarah and Duck attempt to find out why their friend Donkey seems so sad.

episodes.name: Cake Bake
episodes.overview: It's Duck's birthday, so Sarah decides to bake a cake to celebrate.

episodes.name: Bouncy Ball
episodes.overview: Sarah's brand-new bouncy ball has a rather unexpected problem.

episodes.name: Robot Juice
episodes.overview: Duck isn't careful enough with his favourite toy robot.

episodes.name: Scarf Lady's House
episodes.overview: Scarf Lady welcomes Sarah and Duck to her house full of scarves.

episodes.name: Rainbow Lemon
episodes.overview: Sarah and Duck make a colourful new friend during breakfast.

episodes.name: Sit Shop
episodes.overview: When Duck's chair breaks, a bus trip to a very special shop is in order.

episodes.name: Kite Flight
episodes.overview: On a windy day, Sarah and Duck try to get their new kite to fly.

episodes.name: Umbrella and the Rain
episodes.overview: Sarah finds an umbrella that doesn't seem to like the rain.

episodes.name: Big Shop
episodes.overview: Sarah and Duck visit a large department store, looking for some new toys.

episodes.name: Woollen Music
episodes.overview: Scarf Lady's jukebox inspires a knitted instrument band.

episodes.name: Doubles
episodes.overview: Sarah and Duck try to play a tennis doubles match, but are two players short.

episodes.name: Fairground
episodes.overview: A fair is being held in the park, and Sarah and Duck can't find their bench.

episodes.name: Sarah Gets a Cold
episodes.overview: When Sarah has a cold, Duck helps her enjoy a visit to the doctor.

episodes.name: Ribbon Sisters
episodes.overview: Sarah and Duck are trying to exercise but the neighbours need their help.

episodes.name: Stargazing
episodes.overview: Sarah and Duck are excited about seeing some shooting stars.

episodes.name: Coloured Light
episodes.overview: Rainbow's colourful glow inspires an art project.

episodes.name: Strawberry Souffle
episodes.overview: A sleepy Sarah attempts to bake a dessert for a hungry Duck.

episodes.name: Camera
episodes.overview: Inspired by a nature documentary, Sarah and Duck attempt to take photographs of birds.

episodes.name: Tapping Shoes
episodes.overview: Sarah needs some new shoes, but picks out a very unusual pair...

episodes.name: Bobsleigh
episodes.overview: Sarah and Duck learn to bobsleigh and have a speedy, snowy adventure with Scarf Lady's help.

episodes.name: Fireworks Dance
episodes.overview: A game of hide and seek takes longer than usual when Duck gets scared by some fireworks.

episodes.name: Fancy Park
episodes.overview: When their local park is closed, Sarah and Duck try to find a suitable alternative.

episodes.name: Pipe Conductor
episodes.overview: Sarah and Duck are woken up by a loud clanging overhead and decide to investigate the noise.

episodes.name: Slow Quest
episodes.overview: Tortoise is on a mission straight through Sarah and Duck’s house! The pair try to work out what he’s crawling towards.

episodes.name: World Bread Day
episodes.overview: The youngster and her feathered friend take part in a treasure hunt when there is a bread festival in the park.

episodes.name: Pond Princess
episodes.overview: The ducks award Sarah a crown at the pond so she tries to work out what her royal duties should be.

episodes.name: Scared of Stairs
episodes.overview: Flamingo and John are invited to Sarah and Duck's house, but a big obstacle lies in store for John.

episodes.name: Balloon Race
episodes.overview: Scarf Lady takes to the skies in a knitted hot air balloon to race against an old sporting friend.

episodes.name: Puncture Pump
episodes.overview: When their tandem bike gets a flat tyre, Sarah and Duck hope to get help from the local bike shop.

episodes.name: Plate Fog
episodes.overview: Sarah and Duck turn detectives when their friend Plate Girl loses her plate on a foggy day.

episodes.name: Moon Paint
episodes.overview: Sarah and Duck give Moon painting lessons after being inspired by a trip to the art gallery.

episodes.name: The Play
episodes.overview: Sarah and Duck dress up as each other and decide to perform a play!

episodes.name: Bread Bike
episodes.overview: When Bread Man needs help, Sarah and Duck come to the rescue with their tandem bike!

episodes.name: Bug's Button Bank
episodes.overview: Bug's plant is looking droopy, but his button collecting seems to be the cause of the problem...

episodes.name: No More Wool
episodes.overview: Scarf Lady has run out of wool so Sarah and Duck help her to harvest the weeping woollen tree.

episodes.name: Octagon Club
episodes.overview: Sarah decides that octagons are her favourite shape, so starts an eight-person club to celebrate!

episodes.name: Petal Light Picking
episodes.overview: Sarah wants some special lights for her Christmas tree and Bug knows where she might find some.

episodes.name: Outside Outside
episodes.overview: The Shallots want to explore beyond the front garden, so Sarah comes up with a plan.

episodes.name: Umbrella Bubbles
episodes.overview: After getting muddy, Umbrella has to brave his fear of getting wet and take his first bath!

episodes.name: Cloud Tower
episodes.overview: A search for shade on a hot day leads Sarah and Duck to discover a fascinating tower in the park.

episodes.name: Sound Jumble
episodes.overview: When Sarah hears some interesting music on the radio, she and Duck try and recreate it.

episodes.name: The Mouse's Birthday
episodes.overview: Sarah is hoping for a nice, quiet birthday, but does not get her wish once her friends arrive.

episodes.name: Tortoise Snooze
episodes.overview: Sarah & Duck help Tortoise prepare to hibernate.

episodes.name: Fast Slow Bungalow
episodes.overview: John and Flamingo ask Sarah and Duck over for rice cakes and invite them to play their favourite game.

episodes.name: Bags of Bags
episodes.overview: Sarah and Duck help Scarf Lady find her Bag after she misplaces him in the Big Shop.

episodes.name: Ribbon Fall
episodes.overview: The Ribbon Sisters invite Sarah & Duck to their favorite seasonal event in the park.

episodes.name: Garden Gaming
episodes.overview: Duck is getting frustrated with his computer game, so Sarah builds a version he can play.

episodes.name: Seacow Snow Trail
episodes.overview: Sarah and Duck receive some Christmas presents, and are keen to find out who delivered them.

episodes.name: Origami Overload
episodes.overview: John has a problem with the origami flamingos he has made and needs Sarah and Duck's help.

episodes.name: Shallot Circus
episodes.overview: The Shallots have discovered acrobatics and are inspired by the Ribbon Sisters to put on a show.

episodes.name: Toy Tidy
episodes.overview: Duck has been leaving his toys everywhere, so Sarah decides to assist him with tiding his bedroom.

episodes.name: Plate Escape
episodes.overview: Whilst at the Big Shop, Sarah, Duck and Plate Girl discover some unusual inhabitants in the plant section.

episodes.name: The Big Sleepover
episodes.overview: Sarah and Duck invite some friends over for a sleepover, but getting to sleep is tougher than planned.

episodes.name: Paisley Sea
episodes.overview: Sarah and Duck think they are headed to the zoo, but the bus takes a surprising diversion!

episodes.name: Duck's Quack
episodes.overview: Duck has lost his quack, so Sarah suggests visiting the spare sounds section of the Big Shop.

episodes.name: Rainbow's Niece
episodes.overview: Sarah's new color wheel reminds Rainbow that he has not seen his niece for a while...

episodes.name: Decorating Donkey
episodes.overview: It's nearly time for Tortoise to wake up from hibernation so Sarah plans a pretty surprise.

episodes.name: Duck Hotel
episodes.overview: Duck wins a trip for two to a rather exciting hotel and finds that he settles in much quicker than Sarah.

episodes.name: Parasol Show
episodes.overview: Umbrella is nervous about meeting up with his pen pal at the Parasol Show, so Sarah and Duck accompany him.

episodes.name: Extra Bounce
episodes.overview: John's yellow bouncy ball is too bouncy, but Sarah thinks she has a solution.

episodes.name: Cake Relocate
episodes.overview: Cake is tired of living in the fridge, so Sarah and Duck help him think of other ideas.

episodes.name: Lost Librarian
episodes.overview: The librarian has lost his big reference book and Sarah thinks she can help.

episodes.name: Scooter Standstill
episodes.overview: Scooter Boy's confidence is knocked after an accident, so Sarah and Duck try to help.

episodes.name: Music Fixer
episodes.overview: Sarah's tuba is making some very peculiar sounds, so a trip to the Music Shop is in order.

episodes.name: Wool on Wheels
episodes.overview: Scarf Lady holds a knitted treats sale in the park, but the weather causes a problem...

episodes.name: Lemon Café
episodes.overview: Sarah and Duck discover a Lemon Cafe in the park, but it seems to be nearly closing time.

episodes.name: Star Renovation
episodes.overview: Venus has attempted to redecorate the night sky, but now Sarah cannot find any of her favorite constellations.

episodes.name: Woollen Memories
episodes.overview: Sarah and Duck decide to recreate the footage from Scarf Lady's old film reels.

episodes.name: Beach Break
episodes.overview: Sarah and Duck decide to spend a day at the beach and plan to build some sand animals.

episodes.name: Bubble Bumbling
episodes.overview: The Bubble Man is in town so a visit to the Big Shop is in order for Sarah, Duck and Donkey.

episodes.name: Toggle Tangle
episodes.overview: After Sarah helps Scarf Lady prepare the wool for her new roof, she settles down for a dreamy sleep.

episodes.name: Tummy Talk
episodes.overview: Although Sarah is used to having a duck as her best friend, it's still a little strange when, after she forgets her sandwich, her rumbling belly inadvertently starts a conversation with a frog.

episodes.name: Moon's Exhibition
episodes.overview: A trip to the art gallery unexpectedly helps Duck with the hunt for his lost toy Rhino.

episodes.name: Pond Prose
episodes.overview: Sarah is inspired by listening to a poetry record and decides to make up some poetry of her own.

episodes.name: The Art of Pink
episodes.overview: The art gallery holds a celebration of the colour pink and Sarah is keen to take part.

episodes.name: Bug bop
episodes.overview: Bug and his friends lead the duo to their outdoor music concert.

episodes.name: Duck Flies
episodes.overview: When Duck decides to migrate, Sarah remembers the day she and Duck met.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: The series follows the adventures of Sarah, a very kind, polite seven-year-old girl, with big eyes, rosy cheeks and a green hat, and her best friend Duck, a Mallard. The central theme is the relationship between these two characters and the adventures they have together. CBeebies state that the show has two learning themes: 'Friendship and imagination' and 'Problem Solving'.

episodes.name: Picture Planes
episodes.overview: Sarah & Duck experiment with paper aeroplanes and discover an unusual quirk...

episodes.name: Hat Fuss
episodes.overview: hen Scarf Lady is 'knit-stuck', Sarah & Duck take her to a hat museum for inspiration, only to meet up with an old nemesis!

episodes.name: Dewy Morning
episodes.overview: hen the Art Shop is closed, Sarah & Duck explore the park in the early morning.

episodes.name: Sticker Swap
episodes.overview: Sarah goes on a hunt around town to search for an elusive Seacow sticker!

episodes.name: Train Fudge
episodes.overview: When the bus breaks down on the way to the Big Shop, Sarah &a Duck use a train replacement service and go on a quest for fudge!

episodes.name: Magic Panic
episodes.overview: Umbrella's plan to impress his friend Primrose with a magic show goes somewhat adrift!

episodes.name: Birthday Buoy
episodes.overview: To celebrate John's birthday, Cloud Captain takes the gang on an ocean adventure!

episodes.name: Alarm Cluck
episodes.overview: Sarah and Duck take a trip to the Big Shop to get a new alarm clock.

episodes.name: Twang Ball
episodes.overview: Everyone in the Park joins in with Scarf Lady's new game!

episodes.name: Auto Cat
episodes.overview: Duck feels left out when Sarah gets a demanding new toy.

episodes.name: Fluff Bread
episodes.overview: Sarah and Duck help the baker bake Shoku-pan, a light and fluffy type of Japanese bread.

episodes.name: Moon Bow
episodes.overview: On a rainy night searching for a constellation Sarah and Duck meet an unexpected friend.

episodes.name: Mountain Mints
episodes.overview: Sarah and Duck help Bread Man and Cake bake a special Japanese bread for Flamingo and John.

episodes.name: Bench Blocked
episodes.overview: When Sarah and Duck's favourite bench is in use, the pair find other things to do.

episodes.name: Planetarium Aquarium
episodes.overview: Sarah and Duck go to the aquarium to track down a waving fish.

episodes.name: Shallot Boat
episodes.overview: After a night of strong rain, the Shallots set sail on a seafaring adventure.

episodes.name: Cake Decorate
episodes.overview: Cake decides to teach Sarah and Duck how to decorate with icing!

episodes.name: Balloon Barnacles
episodes.overview: Sarah's hat goes on an adventure without her, on top of a balloon.

episodes.name: Basking Shark
episodes.overview: Sarah is keen to adopt a sea creature, but doesn't get her first choice...

episodes.name: Old Toys
episodes.overview: Duck is bored of his toy collection, so he and Sarah search for old toys in the attic.

episodes.name: Hair Cut
episodes.overview: Sarah's hair keeps getting in her way, so it's time for a trip to the hairdressers.

episodes.name: Constable Quack
episodes.overview: When their snacks go missing, Sergeant Sarah & Constable Quack hunt for a biscuit burglar.

episodes.name: Arcade Dance Off
episodes.overview: Stumbling across an arcade, Sarah takes on a dancing challenge with John.

episodes.name: Mars as Moon
episodes.overview: Mars tries to fill in for a missing Moon, but needs a little coaching from Sarah & Duck.

episodes.name: Donkey Jump
episodes.overview: Sarah & Duck try to help Donkey get his jumping confidence back.

episodes.name: Rainbow Race
episodes.overview: The changeable weather means Rainbow has to leave before finishing his story. Sarah and Duck try to find out how the story ends.

episodes.name: Perimeter Pals
episodes.overview: Sarah, Duck and Bug set off on a big adventure through uncharted territory as they attempt to cycle all the way around the park.

episodes.name: Pillow Fill
episodes.overview: Scarf Lady helps Sarah and Duck catch the fluffs and puffs to refill their pillows.

episodes.name: Castle Scribbling
episodes.overview: Whilst visiting a castle, Sarah and Duck's drawings lead them to an exciting discovery.

episodes.name: Cloud Jam
episodes.overview: Music Lady needs Sarah and Duck's help with a music-loving stowaway.

episodes.name: Boo Night
episodes.overview: Sarah and Duck learn all about Boo Night and attempt to make their own scary costumes.

episodes.name: Comet's Coming
episodes.overview: Sarah and Duck are excited to visit the observatory to see a passing comet.

episodes.name: Whatsathingy
episodes.overview: Sarah and Duck try to work out exactly what it is that Scarf Lady has been busily knitting in her sleep.

episodes.name: Brolly Bus
episodes.overview: When Umbrella gets left on the bus, Sarah and Duck head to the bus depot to find him.

episodes.name: Hedge Opera
episodes.overview: Sarah is fascinated by some mysterious music coming from the hedge.

episodes.name: Park Trimming
episodes.overview: Sarah and Duck spot a patch of garden in the park that needs some care, but can't seem to find a gardener.

episodes.name: Haberdasher
episodes.overview: When the zip on Sarah's hoodie breaks, Scarf Lady suggests a trip to the haberdasher.

episodes.name: Cinema Scoot
episodes.overview: Sarah & Duck join Scooter Boy at the cinema to watch his favourite film, but the sound doesn't seem to be working.

episodes.name: Snowball Skate
episodes.overview: Sarah and Duck explore a Winter Fair in the park and discover an amazing skating rink inside a giant snowball!

episodes.name: Ribbon Alvida
episodes.overview: An excited Sarah and Duck take the Shallots to see the Ribbon Sisters perform with their family circus.
